content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron/Copper Mining and Smelting Complex at (-28, -61)
Complex mining and smelting setup consisting of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28, -61) mining iron/copper ore
- Chest at (-27.5, -59.5) collecting iron/copper ore
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5) moving ore to furnace
- Stone furnace at (-27, -58) smelting ore
- Burner inserter at (-25.5, -58.5) moving plates to storage
- Chest at (-24.5, -58.5) storing iron/copper plates
- Additional furnaces at (-23, -58), (-21, -58) with associated inserters
- Output chest at (-22.5, -55.5) storing iron plates

### Iron Mining Complex at (-10, -59)
Large iron mining setup with:
- Three burner mining drills at (-10, -59), (-8, -59), (-6, -59) mining iron ore
- Collection chests at (-9.5, -57.5), (-7.5, -57.5), (-5.5, -57.5)
- Burner inserters moving ore between components
- Transport belt system connecting the components

### Smelting Line at (0, 0)
Large smelting line consisting of:
- Four stone furnaces at (0, 0), (2, 0), (4, 0), (6, 0)
- Input chests at (0.5, -2.5), (2.5, -2.5), (4.5, -2.5), (6.5, -2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5, 2.5), (2.5, 2.5), (4.5, 2.5), (6.5, 2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters moving materials between components
- Transport belt system connecting everything

### Power Generation System at (4.5, 20.5)
Power generation setup with:
- Steam engine at (4.5, 20.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5, 22)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Small electric pole network at (11.5, 20.5) and (7.5, 20.5)

### Coal Mining Setup at (37.5, -86.5)
Basic coal mining setup with:
- Wooden chest at (36.5, -86.5) storing coal

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities on occupied tiles
- Check if target location is clear before placing entities
- Ensure enough space around target location for larger entities like burner mining drills

### Errors when extracting items
- Verify the source container has the requested items before attempting extraction
- Check if you have the correct permissions/access to extract from the container

### Entity power/fuel related errors
- Keep burner entities fueled to maintain operation
- Ensure power network is properly connected and supplied with electricity

### Fluid system connection errors
- Verify pipe connections between fluid producing/consuming entities
- Ensure correct fluid types are being supplied to machines that need them
